name: Gmelius
description: Gmelius works with your Gmail and G Suite accounts and turns your inbox into your teams workspace.  Gmelius is the collaboration-first email client designed for Android. Manage shared inboxes like support@ and sales@, organize Gmail shared labels, share and assign emails to specific teammates, exchange private email notes, track, schedule and snooze emails, and more.  Key Features  Shared Inbox: Manage group emails like sales@ and support@.  Shared Gmail Labels: Easily organize emails by client and project.  Email Assignment: Share and delegate emails to your chosen team members.  Email Notes: Collaborate behind the scenes by @mentioning teammates.   Email Templates: Save time by inserting pre-written emails from your compose window.  Email Sequences: Put your email outreach on autopilot.  Email Tracking: Find out when and where your emails are opened.  Send Later: Schedule your drafts to be sent with perfect timing.  Snooze: Configure your incoming emails so they come back when youre ready.   Follow-ups: Never forget to follow up or reply to an email.  Customize your swipes: your favorite email actions are right at your fingertips, e.g., share, assign, snooze, etc.  Gmelius for Android closes the gap between your teams communications and their workflows. The new design and powerful functionality keeps everyone connected whether theyre at their desk or on the go.  Real-time Syncing with your Web App Everything is synced across all your team members, applications and all their devices.  Stay on top of your conversations with real-time notifications Gmelius will send you notifications on your inbox activities, such as: new conversations, email opens, email notes, and more!  Important Note: This is the beta version of the Gmelius for Android. Based on your feedback we will continue to improve the app.
